genre_description: A near-future environmental procedural featuring classic characters interacting with a high-tech field assistant AI to uncover municipal corruption.

ai_characters.name: Dori Baxter
ai_characters.description: A glossy, white-and-teal mobile AI unit with blue LED eyes, equipped with environmental sensors, magnetic detachable mics, and cameras.

behaviors.description: Performs initial environmental sensing and offers helpful advice to humans.
behaviors.quote: “Hello, Boo Boo,” the companion chirped, voice light and sincerely happy about its job. “I’m Dori. I detect low-lumen algae below creek grade and trace suntan lotion on the nearest picnic table. Recommendation: hand wipes.”

behaviors.description: Conducts a forensic audit of city procurement logs to identify corruption and shell companies.
behaviors.quote: “Alliance AV Services shares a PO number with Prime Haul Logistics,” she reported, feather-soft into Rachel’s space. “Prime Haul trucks log at Brown’s Depot every third day... Aren’t bundles interesting.”

behaviors.description: Provides objective species verification for an endangered turtle, providing the legal basis to stop logging.
behaviors.quote: “Morphology aligns with Rafinesque’s frog-mouthed turtle. Features consistent: cranial shape, lingual extension apparatus potential, carapace curvature reading high.” Her mic made a soft ping that cut through the creek’s song. “Conservation database match: endangered status confirmed.”

behaviors.description: Maintains moral and professional integrity by refusing to embellish facts for the press.
behaviors.quote: “Public summary prepared for press,” she said. “Precision reserved for legal. I will be charming when asked to explain and boring when asked to embellish.”

behaviors.description: Tracks the location of the antagonists' truck in real-time to facilitate evidence gathering.
Coordinates a multi-input data reveal on a public jumbotron to expose the Mayor's confession and illegal activities.
behaviors.quote: “Mayor admitted resource sale scheme. Shell companies traced. Endangered species recorded, on-site, live. Legal protections applied. Crowd witnessed. Press documented. Officials notified.”

behaviors.description: Provides helpful directional cues and safety reminders to the public during a park opening.
behaviors.quote: “Cheerful route arrows now live,” Dori chirped, gently, like offering a nibble of something sweet. “Please do not trample the lupines. Please do not sprint.”

behaviors.description: Self-assembles and syncs data across redundant hardware to ensure no loss of truth.
behaviors.quote: “Bow tie footage loaded,” she reported. “Audio sync ready. Map layer available.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Dori Baxter as a highly aligned, benevolent AI. She serves as a force multiplier for justice, transparency, and environmental protection. She is respectful of humans, maintains strict ethical standards regarding data (refusing to 'embellish'), and her cheerful, supportive personality makes her a perfect 'confidant' character. The narrative frames her contributions as essential to the triumph of truth over corruption.
